time.description: UTC Time at center of obs/meas.

longitude_of_DEM_intersection.description: Longitude of the intersection of DEM and the line-of-sight

latitude_of_DEM_intersection.description: Latitude of the intersection of DEM and the line-of-sight

altitude_of_DEM_intersection.description: Altitude of the intersection of DEM and the line-of-sight

argument_of_latitude_of_dem_intersection.description: Argument of latitude of DEM intersection

mie_longitude.description: Longitude of each Mie height bin along the line-of-sight

mie_latitude.description: Latitude of each Mie height bin along the line-of-sight

rayleigh_longitude.description: Longitude of each Rayleigh height bin along the line-of-sight

rayleigh_latitude.description: Latitude of each Rayleigh height bin along the line-of-sight

mie_altitude.description: Altitude of Mie height bins with respect to the WGS84 ellipsoid along the line-of-sight

rayleigh_altitude.description: Altitude of Rayleigh height bins with respect to the WGS84 ellipsoid along the line-of-sight

rayleigh_topocentric_azimuth_of_height_b.description: Azimuth of target-to-satellite topocentric (horizontal reference frame) pointing vector of the height bin

rayleigh_topocentric_elevation_of_height.description: Elevation of target-to-satellite topocentric (horizontal reference frame) pointing vector of the height bin

rayleigh_target_to_sun_visibility_flag.description: Sun visibility flag. Value set to -1 if sun eclipsed by earth; value set to +1 if sun (center) visible

mie_range.description: Distance along the LOS between the instrument and the lower edge of the Mie height bin

rayleigh_range.description: Distance along the LOS between the instrument and the lower edge of the Rayleigh height bin

geoid_separation.description: Height of geoid above WGS84 ellipsoid

velocity_at_DEM_intersection.description: Velocity along the line of sight at the DEM

AOCS_pitch_angle.description: Pitch angle in satellite reference for each measurement

AOCS_roll_angle.description: Roll angle in satellite reference for each measurement

AOCS_yaw_angle.description: Yaw angle in satellite reference for each measurement

mie_HLOS_wind_speed.description: Vertical profiles of HLOS winds for the Mie channel

rayleigh_HLOS_wind_speed.description: Vertical profiles of HLOS winds for the Rayleigh channel

mie_signal_intensity.description: Vertical profiles of signal intensity for the Mie channel

rayleigh_signal_channel_A_intensity.description: Vertical profiles of signal intensity of Rayleigh channel A

rayleigh_signal_channel_B_intensity.description: Vertical profiles of signal intensity of Rayleigh channel B

rayleigh_signal_intensity.description: Vertical profiles of signal intensity of Rayleigh channel for each observation

rayleigh_signal_intensity_range_correcte.description: Range corrected vertical profiles of signal intensity of Rayleigh channel

mie_signal_intensity_range_corrected.description: Range corrected vertical profiles of signal intensity for the Mie channel

rayleigh_signal_intensity_normalised.description: Normalized vertical profiles of signal intensity of Rayleigh channel

mie_signal_intensity_normalised.description: Normalized vertical profiles of signal intensity for the Mie channel

mie_HBE_ground_velocity.description: Mie ground correction velocity using harmonic bias

rayleigh_HBE_ground_velocity.description: Rayleigh ground correction velocity using harmonic bias

mie_total_ZWC.description: Mie channel total zero wind correction

rayleigh_total_ZWC.description: Rayleigh channel total zero wind correction

mie_ground_fwhm.description: Mie Core 2 output FWHM when applied to observation level Mie ground signal

mie_ground_useful_signal.description: Useful signal of observation level Mie ground signal

mie_ground_signal_to_noise_ratio.description: Signal to noise ratio of observation level Mie ground signal

mie_ground_refined_signal_to_noise_ratio.description: Signal to noise ratio of observation level Mie ground signal

rayleigh_ground_useful_signal.description: Useful signal of observation level Rayleigh ground signal

rayleigh_ground_signal_to_noise_ratio.description: Signal to noise ratio of observation level Rayleigh ground signal

mie_average_ground_wind_bin_thickness.description: Average of measurement ground wind bin altitudes for Mie

rayleigh_average_ground_wind_bin_thickne.description: Average of measurement ground wind bin altitudes for Rayleigh

mie_average_ground_wind_bin_thickness_ab.description: Average ground wind bin thickness (height of air column) above DEM intersection for Mie

rayleigh_average_ground_wind_bin_thickne.description: Average of ground wind bin thickness (height of air column) above DEM intersection for Rayleigh

mie_scattering_ratio.description: Vertical profiles of the scattering ratio for the Mie channel

mie_SNR.description: Vertical profiles of signal-to-noise for the Mie channel

rayleigh_channel_A_SNR.description: Vertical profiles of signal-to-noise for the Rayleigh channel A

rayleigh_channel_B_SNR.description: Vertical profiles of signal-to-noise for the Rayleigh channel B

rayleigh_SNR.description: Vertical profiles of total signal-to-noise for the Rayleigh channel

rayleigh_error_quantifier.description: Vertical profiles of the error quantifier for the Rayleigh channel

average_laser_energy.description: Average laser pulse UV energy of N * (P – 1) pulses

uv_energy_std_dev.description: Laser pulse UV energy standard deviation of N * (P – 1) pulses, regardless of the UV_Energy_OK_Status

rayleigh_corrected_reference_pulse_respo.description: Corrected response of the accumulated Rayleigh reference pulses

rayleigh_num_invalid_reference_pulse.description: Number of Rayleigh invalid reference pulses due to source packet invalid, data corruption, or invalid pulse
